TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DayRenderEventArgs extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 控件的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管不支持数据绑定控件，它是可以修改内容以及各个日期单元格的格式设置。Although data binding is not supported for the control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells. 之前控件显示在网页上，它会创建并汇编构成控件的组件。Before the control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control. 引发事件时的每一天中的单元格创建控件。The event is raised when each date cell in the control is created. 你可以控制的内容和提供的事件处理程序中的代码创建时的日期单元格格式事件。You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the event. 事件处理程序接收包含事件数据的对象。The event handler receives a object that contains event data. 使用属性来访问呈现的单元格。Use the property to access the cell being rendered. 若要访问呈现一天中的属性，请使用属性。To access the properties of the day being rendered, use the property. 在自定义单元格的内容，你可能想要保留的回发的行为，当用户选择呈现的日期。When customizing the content for a cell, you might want to preserve the postback behavior when the user selects the date being rendered. 这通常可通过呈现用于自定义内容的一部分发送到该页的脚本。This is typically done by rendering the script used to post the page as part of the custom content. 若要检索用于将页面回发到服务器脚本，请使用属性。To retrieve the script used to post the page back to the server, use the property. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件以使的背景色的中显示的月份日期为黄色。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to make the background color yellow for the days in the displayed month. 它还演示了如何通过添加自定义单元格的内容到单元格的控件。It also demonstrates how to customize the contents of a cell by adding a control to the cell. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Calendar.DayRender Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Calendar.DayRender Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Calendar.DayRender Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Calendar.DayRender Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 实例时创建此构造函数的调用中，通过下表中显示的属性初始化为指定的值。When an instance of is created by a call to this constructor, the properties shown in the following table are initialized to the specified values. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`cell` 参数的值。The value of the `cell` parameter.| ||`day` 参数的值。The value of the `day` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数。This constructor is used primarily by control developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 实例时创建此构造函数的调用中，通过下表中显示的属性初始化为指定的值。When an instance of is created by a call to this constructor, the properties shown in the following table are initialized to the specified values. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`cell` 参数的值。The value of the `cell` parameter.| ||`day` 参数的值。The value of the `day` parameter.| ||`selectUrl` 参数的值。The value of the `selectUrl` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数。This constructor is used primarily by control developers.

summary.span: 获取表示呈现在 控件中的单元格的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that represents the cell being rendered in the control.

value.span: 表示呈现在 中的单元格的 。

span.span: The that represents the cell being rendered in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以编程方式控制以呈现的单元格控件。Use the property to programmatically control the cell being rendered in the control. 可以通过动态添加控件添加到自定义单元格的内容集合属性。You can customize the contents of a cell by dynamically adding controls to the collection of the property. > [!NOTE] > 因为引发事件时时呈现控件，所以无法添加的控件，也可以引发事件，例如。Because the event is raised while the control is being rendered, you cannot add a control that can also raise an event, such as . 你可以添加仅静态控件，例如， ， ，和。You can add only static controls, such as , , , and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式将在显示的月份中各天的背景色更改为黄色。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically change the background color of the days in the displayed month to yellow. 它还演示了如何通过添加自定义单元格的内容控制转移到集合属性。It also demonstrates how to customize the contents of a cell by adding a control to the collection of the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DayRenderEventArgs.Cell Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DayRenderEventArgs.Cell Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DayRenderEventArgs.Cell Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DayRenderEventArgs.Cell Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取表示呈现在 控件中的日期的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that represents the day being rendered in the control.

value.span: 表示呈现在 中的日期的 。

span.span: The that represents the day being rendered in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来获取有关一天中呈现的信息控件。Use the property to get information about the day being rendered in the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定在一天所呈现的是否控件是否处于当前月份和工作日。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether the day being rendered in the control is in the current month and also a weekday. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DayRenderEventArgs.Day Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DayRenderEventArgs.Day Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DayRenderEventArgs.Day Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DayRenderEventArgs.Day Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

.property instance string SelectUrl
Public ReadOnly Property SelectUrl As String
public: property System::String ^ SelectUrl { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在 控件中选择呈现的日期时用于将此页回发至服务器的脚本。

span.span: Gets the script used to post the page back to the server when the date being rendered is selected in a control.

value.span: 选择呈现的日期时用于将此页回发至服务器的脚本。

span.span: The script used to post the page back to the server when the date being rendered is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性，以检索用于呈现的日期选择中时将页面回发到服务器脚本控件。Use the property to retrieve the script used to post the page back to the server when the date being rendered is selected in a control. 当你想要自定义为日期，呈现的内容，但仍想要保留的回发的行为时，通常使用此属性。This property is typically used when you want to customize the content rendered for a date, but still want to retain the postback behavior. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义为今天的日期呈现的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to customize the content rendered for today's date. 值属性插入到所呈现内容，以便控件将回发到服务器，当用户选择今天的日期。The value of the property is inserted into the rendered content so that the control will post back to the server when the user selects today's date. [!code-aspx-csharp[DayRenderEventArgsSelectUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/dayrendereventargsselecturl/CS/DayRenderEventArgsSelectUrlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DayRenderEventArgsSelectUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/dayrendereventargsselecturl/VB/DayRenderEventArgsSelectUrlvb.aspx#1)]
